reviewText: This DVD is an advertisement. Get the other videos in the series. This DVD just hypes you up to buy the other videos and watch them.

Save your money, watch some Youtube videos .This is for complete newbies, information bounces all over the place. Twenty minutes wasted making homemade fire starters from crayons. The bug out bag section everyone had the bag beside them but no one opened it up and showed contents .Dave Canterbury's portion is the only value. Go to the Pathfinder Self Reliance website and buy his Survival books instead.
Great information, and all segments are clear and well thought out and easy to follow.

Essentials of Survival is a great introduction to the important points of surviving out in the wilderness. It covers all the basics, including food, water, shelter, fire, etc. Paul Howe is obviously quite knowledgeable as well as a fine instructor. This is yet another of Panteao's excellent products.
